desc: Scenic Road Cider is nestled among the rolling hills of the beautiful Okanagan Valley. Respecting the apple, the ingredients, and the process, we create distinctive ciders with equal parts tradition and innovation in Kelowna, BC.

layout.text: WE ARE NOW OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK!

We are open from 11 am to 5 pm Monday to Thursday and 11 am to 6 pm Friday to Sunday.
No reservation is required and families and pets are welcome.
